title: Grace's Mystery Seed
description: ‘Polly likes these stripy seeds,’ Grace said. ‘What are they from?’‘Let’s find out,’ said Mrs Marino.Grace and her neighbour plant a mystery seed. They wait and wait for ages. Then a little green shoot starts to grow . . . and grow . . . and grow . . . until, at last, Grace discovers the truth about her amazing mystery seed.
author: Juliet M. Sampson
